title: Traditional Metal Engraving Workshop
caption: An experienced craftsman and an assistant engrave detailed patterns into metal trays in a warm workshop.

image.alt: An older craftsman uses a hammer and chisel to engrave a metal tray while a younger man works beside him in a workshop.

fullDescription.en: Inside a traditional workshop, an older craftsman uses a hammer and chisel to engrave a detailed pattern into a metal tray. A younger man sits beside him, working on another piece, which suggests apprenticeship or teamwork. The space is filled with brass and copper items, and the warm light highlights the texture of the metal and the careful hand movements. The atmosphere feels quiet and focused, showing pride in craftsmanship and attention to detail.

intermediateEnglish.en: In a traditional workshop, an older craftsman is engraving a metal tray with a hammer and chisel. A younger man sits beside him and works on another tray, so they may be making items together. The shop is full of brass and copper objects, and the warm lighting makes the scene feel calm. Both men look concentrated, as if they want the pattern to be perfect.

advancedEnglish.en: This photo shows skilled craftsmanship inside a warm, traditional workshop. The older man carefully taps a chisel with a hammer to carve an intricate pattern into a metal tray, and his steady posture suggests years of experience. The younger man works quietly beside him, which could mean he is an assistant or an apprentice learning the technique. Decorative brass and copper items in the background create a rich cultural setting, and the soft lighting emphasizes texture and detail. When they finish, they will likely polish the surface and prepare the piece for display or sale.

An experienced craftsman and an assistant engrave detailed patterns into metal trays in a warm workshop. اطرافشان hammer، chisel، metal tray و brass/copper vessels دیده می‌شود و فضا concentrated، patient و skilled است. لباس‌ها، مثل dark work shirt و casual work clothes هم با موقعیت و محیط هماهنگ است.

grammarUsed.en: Present continuous for actions now, there is/are for visible objects, and adjectives/prepositions for setting and mood.
grammarUsed.fa: حال استمراری برای کارهای در جریان، there is/are برای اشیای قابل مشاهده، و صفت/حروف اضافه برای توصیف محیط و حس.

en.tense: Present Continuous (am/is/are + V‑ing) for actions happening now in the photo.
howToBuild: Choose the subject (who?): they / the family / the coworkers.
Pick an action you can SEE and use am/is/are + V‑ing.
Add place details with prepositions: at, in, on, near.
Add one short feeling sentence: They look… / The atmosphere feels…
examples: They are engraving.
There are hammer and chisel in traditional workshop / bazaar craft shop.
The atmosphere feels concentrated.

fa.tense: حال استمراری (am/is/are + فعل ing) برای کارهایی که همین الآن در عکس در حال انجام است.
howToBuild: اول فاعل را انتخاب کن (چه کسی؟): they / the family / the coworkers.
یک کاری که در عکس می‌بینی انتخاب کن و با am/is/are + ing بساز.
جزئیات مکان را با حروف اضافه اضافه کن: at, in, on, near.
یک جمله کوتاه درباره حس اضافه کن: They look… / The atmosphere feels…
examples: آن‌ها در حال engraving هستند.
در traditional workshop / bazaar craft shop hammer و chisel دیده می‌شود.
فضا concentrated به نظر می‌رسد.

scenarios.title: A memory
scenarios.en: Last weekend, I found myself at traditional workshop / bazaar craft shop. An experienced craftsman and an assistant engrave detailed patterns into metal trays in a warm workshop. At first, I noticed hammer, chisel, metal tray and the way people were engraving. Then I looked closer: their clothing (dark work shirt, casual work clothes) and their expressions made the scene feel concentrated, patient, skilled. After that, something small happened that changed the mood, and we had to respond quickly. In the end, we solved it, and the moment became a story I still remember.
scenarios.fa: آخرِ هفته‌ی قبل traditional workshop / bazaar craft shop بودم. An experienced craftsman and an assistant engrave detailed patterns into metal trays in a warm workshop. اول hammer، chisel و metal tray را دیدم و اینکه آدم‌ها چطور engraving. بعد دقیق‌تر نگاه کردم: لباس‌ها (dark work shirt و casual work clothes) و حالت چهره‌ها باعث شد فضا concentrated، patient و skilled به نظر برسد. بعدش یک اتفاق کوچک افتاد که حال‌وهوا را عوض کرد و مجبور شدیم سریع واکنش نشان بدهیم. آخرش حلش کردیم و همان لحظه تبدیل شد به خاطره‌ای که هنوز یادم می‌ماند.

grammarUsed.en: Past simple with time marker (last weekend) and sequencing (at first/then/after that/in the end).
grammarUsed.fa: گذشته ساده با قید زمان و ترتیب رخدادها (اول/بعد/بعدش/آخرش).

en.tense: Past Simple (V2) to tell a short memory, plus sequencing words (first/then/finally).
sentenceStructure: Time markers: yesterday / last week / a few minutes ago.
howToBuild: Start with a time phrase: Yesterday, Last weekend, A few minutes ago…
Change the main action into past simple (reviewed, chose, played…).
Use sequencing words to make a clear story: first, then, after that, finally.
End with a result or feeling: Everyone felt… / It turned out…
examples: Yesterday, they engraved.
Then, they checked hammer and continued.
Finally, they felt concentrated about the outcome.

fa.tense: گذشته ساده (Past Simple) برای تعریف یک خاطره کوتاه، همراه با کلمات ترتیب‌دهنده (first/then/finally).
sentenceStructure: عبارات زمانی: yesterday / last week / a few minutes ago
howToBuild: با یک عبارت زمانی شروع کن: Yesterday, Last weekend, A few minutes ago…
فعل اصلی را به گذشته ساده تبدیل کن (reviewed, chose, played…).
از کلمات ترتیب‌دهنده استفاده کن: first, then, after that, finally.
با نتیجه یا حس تمام کن: Everyone felt… / It turned out…
examples: دیروز، They engraved.
بعد، They hammer را بررسی کرد و ادامه داد.
در نهایت، آن‌ها درباره نتیجه concentrated بودند.

scenarios.title: Reflection
scenarios.en: Over the past few months, I have started paying attention to scenes like this. I have noticed that details such as hammer, chisel, metal tray, brass/copper vessels are not background; they guide the story. I have also learned how actions like hammering can signal feelings such as concentrated, patient, skilled. Since then, I have taken more time to observe before I speak, and my descriptions have become clearer and more specific.
scenarios.fa: در چند ماه گذشته شروع کرده‌ام به صحنه‌هایی مثل این بیشتر دقت کنم. متوجه شده‌ام جزئیاتی مثل hammer، chisel، metal tray و brass/copper vessels فقط «پس‌زمینه» نیستند؛ آن‌ها مسیر داستان را تعیین می‌کنند. همچنین یاد گرفته‌ام کارهایی مثل hammering چطور می‌تواند احساساتی مثل concentrated، patient و skilled را نشان بدهد. از آن زمان بیشتر قبل از حرف زدن مشاهده می‌کنم و توصیف‌هایم واضح‌تر و دقیق‌تر شده است.

grammarUsed.en: Present perfect to connect past learning to the present, plus since/over the past to frame experience.
grammarUsed.fa: حال کامل برای وصل کردن یادگیری گذشته به حال، همراه با «در چند ماه گذشته/از آن زمان».

en.tense: Present Perfect (have/has + past participle) to connect past experience to the present; use since/for/already/yet.
howToBuild: Say what has happened up to now (experience/result).
Use since (a starting point) or for (a duration).
Add a contrast or reflection: however, although, even though.
Finish with what they are doing now (present continuous) if needed.
examples: They have already handled similar situations before.
They have learned to stay concentrated in traditional workshop / bazaar craft shop.
Although it looks routine, the details have mattered.

fa.tense: حال کامل (have/has + شکل سوم فعل) برای ربط دادن گذشته به حال؛ همراه با since/for/already/yet.
howToBuild: بگو تا همین الآن چه تجربه/نتیجه‌ای اتفاق افتاده.
از since (نقطه شروع) یا for (مدت زمان) استفاده کن.
یک جمله‌ی بازتاب/تضاد اضافه کن: however, although, even though.
اگر لازم شد با یک جمله حال استمراری وضعیت الآن را بگو.
examples: They قبلاً موقعیت‌های مشابهی را تجربه کرده است.
They یاد گرفته است در traditional workshop / bazaar craft shop concentrated بماند.
اگرچه کار روتین به نظر می‌رسد، جزئیات مهم بوده‌اند.

scenarios.title: A challenge
scenarios.en: If we were to replay this moment at traditional workshop / bazaar craft shop, one small change could create a big problem. If hammer, chisel had been missing or damaged, we would have had to improvise. Someone might have said, “We should slow down and check,” and another person could have replied that we were running out of time. In a situation like this, we should prioritize safety and clarity, even if it means changing the plan. If I had ignored those details, I might have misunderstood the whole scene.
scenarios.fa: اگر قرار بود این لحظه در traditional workshop / bazaar craft shop دوباره تکرار شود، یک تغییر کوچک می‌توانست یک مشکل بزرگ بسازد. اگر hammer و chisel نبود یا آسیب دیده بود، مجبور می‌شدیم بداهه تصمیم بگیریم. ممکن بود کسی بگوید «باید آهسته‌تر برویم و بررسی کنیم» و نفر دیگری جواب بدهد که وقت کم داریم. در چنین موقعیتی بهتر است ایمنی و شفافیت را در اولویت بگذاریم، حتی اگر مجبور شویم برنامه را تغییر بدهیم. اگر آن جزئیات را نادیده می‌گرفتم، شاید کل صحنه را اشتباه می‌فهمیدم.

grammarUsed.en: Conditionals for hypotheticals, modals for advice/possibility, and short reported speech (might have said/could have replied).
grammarUsed.fa: شرطی‌ها برای موقعیت فرضی، افعال کمکی برای امکان/پیشنهاد، و نقل‌قول غیرمستقیم برای بازگویی گفت‌وگو.

en.tense: Mixed grammar for higher-level storytelling: conditionals, modals (might/must), and reported speech.
sentenceStructure: Second conditional: If + past simple, would + base verb.
Third conditional: If + had + V3, would have + V3.
Modals of deduction: might/must/can't + base verb.
Reported speech: He said (that) … / She asked if …
howToBuild: Describe the challenge and add a hypothetical solution (If…, would…).
Use modals to infer causes from the photo (They might…, It must…).
Add reported speech for realism: Someone said that…
Finish with a consequence or lesson learned.
examples: If they had checked hammer earlier, they would have avoided a mistake.
They might be under pressure, but they must stay concentrated.
The supervisor said that every detail mattered.

fa.tense: گرامر ترکیبی سطح بالا: شرطی‌ها، افعال کمکی (might/must) و نقل قول غیرمستقیم (reported speech).
sentenceStructure: شرطی نوع دوم: If + past simple, would + فعل ساده.
شرطی نوع سوم: If + had + V3, would have + V3.
نقل قول غیرمستقیم: He said (that)… / She asked if…
howToBuild: چالش را بگو و یک راه‌حل فرضی اضافه کن (If…, would…).
با مدال‌ها درباره علت‌ها حدس بزن (might/must).
برای واقعی‌تر شدن از reported speech استفاده کن.
در پایان نتیجه یا درسِ داستان را بگو.
examples: اگر They زودتر hammer را چک کرده بود، اشتباه را جلوگیری می‌کرد.
ممکن است تحت فشار باشند، اما باید concentrated بمانند.
سرپرست گفت که هر جزئیاتی مهم است.
